---
applyTo: 'apps/web-*/**'
---

# Web App UI Guidelines

共享组件库在 `packages/share-ui`，共享前端工具库在 `packages/share-frontend`。请优先使用共享组件和工具库来构建 Web 应用。

引入示例：

```tsx
import { Button } from '@repo/share-ui/components/reui/button';
import { Conversation } from '@repo/share-ui/components/ai-elements/conversation';
```
